questions.question: Who was the king of France at the start of the French Revolution?
What event marked the beginning of the French Revolution?
Which document declared equal rights for all male citizens in revolutionary France?
options: Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen
questions.answer: Declaration of the Rights of Man and of the Citizen
